summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MyImpact University Admin Dashboard v1 Sprint. All core features functional including data-driven KPIs, verification workflows, student management, and CSV exports.
passed_tests: Backend API health check and all 15 endpoints (100% success rate)
Dashboard title displays 'Columbia University – Test Pilot Dashboard'
KPIs derived from actual data: 108.1 verified hours, 25 active students, 3 programs, 84% completion rate
Programs panel shows 3 programs with student counts, clickable modals with detailed stats
Verification requests showing 9+ pending requests with student info, hours, dates, evidence tier
Confirm workflow: updates KPIs instantly (98.0→108.1 hours), shows toast, removes from queue
Reject workflow: menu → reject option → modal with reason select → submit (functional)
Flag workflow: menu → flag option → modal with text input → submit (functional)
Participants page: 25 students in sortable table with status badges
Student detail panel: opens on row click, shows logs and verification history
Reports page: CSV export for verified logs and audit trail (downloads working)
Admin avatars: Ellina (Program Admin) and Lio (Platform Admin) tooltips on hover
Term selector: functional filtering between Fall 2025, Spring 2026, Summer 2026
Table sorting by name, hours, verification percentage, status
